Tue, 18 Mar 2025 06:00:00 +0000 Hamilton man Tony Wagner, together with his wife Ying Qiu, have each been fined $5000 for selling 32kg of crayfish caught with a customary permit. Photo / Facebook

Tue, 18 Mar 2025 05:25:03 +0000 Five teenagers have been arrested after break-ins at two Whangārei service stations. Photo / Bevan Conley
High Court judge reserves decision on Whangārei fluoridation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/high-court-judge-erves-riserves-decision-on-whangarei-fluoridation/3ifjrgvpjbhrjcexvbbhrjcexvbt5nnibry/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/high-court-judge-erves-riserves-decision-on-whangarei-fluoridation/3ifjrgvpjbhrjcexvbbhrjcexvbt5nnibry/ Susan Botting, Sarah CurtisThe High Court has heard Whangārei District Council's application for an injunction. Tue, 18 Mar 2025 05:05:52 +0000 A High Court judge has reserved her decision as to whether Whangārei District Council can stall fluoridation of its drinking water. Photo / NZ Herald graphic
Tauranga District Court trial: Marc Hunter accepts assaulting woman, pleads guilty during trial https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/tauranga-district-court-marc-hunter-accepts-assaulting-woman-pleads-woman-pleads-guilty-guilty-guilty-durial/v2222227t57pvghghghghghghbhbjchflibalnc6q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/tauranga-district-court-marc-hunter-accepts-assaulting-woman-pleads-woman-pleads-guilty-guilty-guilty-durial/v2222227t57pvghghghghghghbhbjchflibalnc6q/ Hannah BartlettThe man pleaded guilty to an altered charge on the second day of his trial. Tue, 18 Mar 2025 05:00:00 +0000 Marc Hunter accepts he assaulted a woman he had a relationship with, ending a domestic violence trial in the Tauranga District Court.
The video that shows how Napier residents would flee a daytime tsunami https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/the-video-that-shows-how-now-napier-residents-would-flee-a-a-daytime-tsunami/kn4uqtkupnfy5p32e2ez2ez2ez2ez2ez2dddduemha/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/the-video-that-shows-how-now-napier-residents-would-flee-a-a-daytime-tsunami/kn4uqtkupnfy5p32e2ez2ez2ez2ez2ez2dddduemha/ Chris Hyde, Michaela GowerGNS-created model turns people into red dots as they walk and run to high ground. Tue, 18 Mar 2025 04:47:46 +0000 Seven minutes after a long-strong earthquake, Napier's inner city roads will be heavily congested with people trying to get to high ground. Photo / GNS simulation

How NZ could face twice as many big rain-making ‘atmospheric rivers’ by the century’s end https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/how-now-nz-could-face-twice-any-big-rain-making-making-making-making-making-atmospheric-trivers-by-the-centurys-the-centurys-end/hfv524nzdrcxpxpbdful53ujaxhu/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/how-now-nz-could-face-twice-any-big-rain-making-making-making-making-making-atmospheric-trivers-by-the-centurys-the-centurys-end/hfv524nzdrcxpxpbdful53ujaxhu/ Jamie MortonThe country could be hit by many more extreme 'atmospheric rivers' in the coming decades.
